data: The organization Bright Futures Academy is a nonprofit educational institution.
The organization Bright Futures Academy operates primarily in the education industry with a nonprofit secondary focus.
The organization Bright Futures Academy is dedicated to empowering underprivileged youth through STEM education.
The organization Bright Futures Academy provides accessible quality education and mentorship to foster the next generation of innovators.
The organization Bright Futures Academy emphasizes the values of integrity, innovation, and inclusivity.
The organization Bright Futures Academy is located in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
The organization Bright Futures Academy was founded in 2010 by a group of educators and philanthropists.
